Profiles Module¶

The profile module takes care of profile management. The profile model class is part of core, but the websocket handlers to modify the profile are part of a module.

Code References¶

services.web_ui.controllers.ws.profiles¶

The websocket controller for the profiles module

copyright:Copyright 2009-2011 OS-Networks.
license:BSD, see LICENSE for details.

  • profile_uuid (str) – The profile’s uuid to use

Renders the login dialog template TODO: Currently we only supply the form layout here. Actual login could be done through websockets as well though, but that requires manupilation of the django session object, and clientside cookie handling.
